title: Tapit_bd

content: The Affiliate Program of Tapbit exchange is live for Arabic-Russian-German-French-Spanish（Chinese language skill is preferred）We can offer the highest commissions in the industry, with up to 70% of the commission on transaction fees and a base salary of up to 6000U. Tapbit was established in November 2021 by a group of professionals who have significant experience in the cryptocurrencies and forex markets. The goal is to build a borderless trading platform based on crypto to facilitate cross-asset and innovative derivatives trading for global investors and traders.7 FeaturesIncluding spot trading, futures trading, copy trade, Earn, OTC trading, Forex&commodities CFDs, and NFTAdvantages40 Million Insurance fund + Top Wallet Security200,000 transactions per second with less than 1ms order response time Top 31 Cryptocurrency exchanges in CoinmarketcapSupport over 30 countries' fiat currenciesAll of our products are designed to benefit users and make them loyal to Tapbit, and it is the only way we can make more profits to you guys if we prioritize this.If you are looking for a new exchange platform and are interested in this opportunity,Plz contact: summerw@tapbit.com Telegram:https://t.me/summerw7
